txt.en: You have poked many holes in the rowboats of the Corsairs. These violent men will never make it back to their tall ships anchored far offshore -- not without swimming.
Rowing boats can be found on the shore at Hashadîr, south of Dol Amroth.\n\nYou should compromise the rowing boats' ability to float.
The last rowing boat can be found on the shore at Hashadîr, south of Dol Amroth.\n\nYou should find the last rowing boat, and take it to the tall ships anchored offshore.
The last rowing boat can be found on the shore at Hashadîr, south of Dol Amroth.\n\nYou should take the last rowing boat to the tall ships anchored offshore.
Rowing boats can be found on the shore at Hashadîr, south of Dol Amroth.\n\nYou should compromise the rowing boats' ability to float.
Find the last rowing boat, and use it to get to the tall ships
The last rowing boat can be found on the shore at Hashadîr, south of Dol Amroth.\n\nYou should take the last rowing boat to the tall ships anchored offshore.
You should take the last rowing boat off to the tall ships
This boat will not make it far before becoming waterlogged ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Corsairs at Hashadîr have drawn a number of rowing boats ashore, using these to get to and from their tall ships.
Destroy the bottoms of rowing boats ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The Corsairs at Hashadîr have drawn a number of rowing boats ashore, using these to get to and from their tall ships.\n\nYou should destroy the rowing boats, poking holes in the bottom, so that the boats will sink when used.
